# mini_logger

A simple logging utility with multi-argument support

## Installation

You can install py_mini_logger using pip:

```bash
pip install py_mini_logger
```

## Usage

```python
from mini_logger import getLogger

logger = getLogger('my_app')
logger.info('This is an info message')
logger.error('Error occurred:', some_variable)
```

## Contribution

If you have any suggestions, improvements, or issues regarding mini_logger, feel free to open an issue or submit a pull request on GitHub.
